verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him from the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> <S%H120>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of you <S%H7126>brings<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H929>animals<s%> from the <S%H1241>herd<s%> or the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> from the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it, a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect;<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> that he may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> that it may be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for him to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> up the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
'He shall then <S%H6584>skin<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into its <S%H5409>pieces.<s%>

'And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H6186>arrange<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> on the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

'Then Aaron's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H6186>arrange<s%> the <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H6309>suet<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> that is on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'Its <S%H7130>entrails,<s%> however, and its <S%H3767>legs<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%> And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> of the <S%H3775>sheep<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> it on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'He shall then <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into its <S%H5409>pieces<s%> with its <S%H7218>head<s%> and its <S%H6309>suet,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>arrange<s%> them on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> that is on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'The <S%H7130>entrails,<s%> however, and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%> And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it, and <S%H6999>offer<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> from the <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> from <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H4454>wring<s%> <S%H4454>off<s%> its <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6999>offer<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and its <S%H1818>blood<s%> is to be <S%H4680>drained<s%> out on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'He shall also <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> its <S%H4760>crop<s%> with its <S%H5133>feathers,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H9506>eastward,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1880>ashes.<s%>

'Then he shall <S%H8156>tear<s%> it by its <S%H3671>wings,<s%> [but] shall not <S%H914>sever<s%> [it]. And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H784>fire;<s%> it is a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
